headline: State Sen. Matt Dolan makes case to replace Rob Portman at Republican luncheon
author: Mark Caudill
sentences: His private sector experience includes being a partner at the law firm in his hometown of Chardon, as well as vice president of 7th Avenue Management and part of the ownership group of the Cleveland Guardians.

Dolan has been an attorney for more than 30 years
His public service career began as assistant state attorney general and later as chief assistant prosecutor for Geauga County.
Asked about possible military intervention by the United States, Dolan said he does not support "boots on the ground" in Ukraine "as ugly as it is, as tragic as it is."
Unlike many members of his party, including some of his opponents, Dolan does not want to decertify the 2020 election that saw Biden knock off Donald Trump.

Dolan addresses war in Ukraine
